pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, March 29, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a United Nations Meeting of Heads of State and Government on the International Debt Architecture and Liquidity.

The event will be streamed online at http://webtv.un.org, as well as https://twitter.com/UNWebTV.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a joint press conference with the Secretary-General of the United Nations, António Guterres, and the Prime Minister of Jamaica, Andrew Holness.

The event will be streamed online at http://webtv.un.org, as well as https://twitter.com/UNWebTV.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.
